pages.text: $(li)The Seagrass is an underwater plant that generates in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/river)Rivers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/frozen_river)Frozen Rivers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/beach)Beaches$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/ocean)Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/deep_ocean)Deep Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/lukewarm_ocean)Lukewarm Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/deep_lukewarm_ocean)Deep Lukewarm Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/deep_cold_ocean)Deep Cold Oceans$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/cold_ocean)Cold Oceans$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/marsh)Marsh$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/turtle)Turtles$(/l).
